recipe_name: Prawn and spring onion siu mai
author: Galton Blackiston
programme: Put Your Money Where Your Mouth Is
method: Mix the minced prawns, spring onions, sesame oil and soy sauce together in a bowl. Lay the wonton wrappers on a clean surface and place one tablespoon of the mixture into the centre of each wrapper. Draw up the sides of each wonton wrapper, leaving the top exposed. Place into a bamboo steamer and cook over a pan of boiling water for 6-8 minutes. Serve directly from the steamer basket.
ingredients: 200g/7Â¼oz raw tiger prawns, shells removed, de-veined, minced in a food processor,  3 spring onions, finely sliced,  1 tsp sesame oil,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  12 wonton wrappers
